title: Professional Development School with 150Bond  | In-person
location: 740 Broadway New York, NY (near Waverley Place)
description: 150Bond, is a team of story tellers. They are a team of former journalists, editors, founders, writers, and experienced communicators who work with companies and founders to tell their story, helping to shape the companies, stories, and innovations that will transform society.

title: Financial Management Series | Holiday Money Mindset | Virtual
description: Getting wrapped up in holiday spending? Get savvy with budgeting tips from Belinda Tsui, a Savvy Ladies Helpline Volunteer. Get tips on making your Holiday List and checking it twice and create your holiday money mindset and spend within your limits.
